job description:
• Ramp up on Zipline's systems, learning how our software, hardware, and operations systems work together to deliver life-saving medical supplies
  • Lead a key analytics project from question to completion, operationalizing your key results into a real-time dashboard
  • Become an expert user of our data analysis tools
Within 3 months you will
  • Take ownership of our automated analysis suite, managing and improving the evaluation of tracking metrics
  • Build out key metrics and dashboards as part of our automated release process
  • Evangelize data visualization best practices throughout the company
Within 6 months you will
  • Become a go-to internal resource for finding relevant telemetry/logs
  • Routinely drive decision-making at Zipline through your work
Must Haves
  • Programming - proficient in Python scripting and data analysis, e.g. Pandas, Numpy, Scipy, Matplotlib
  • Data Visualization - ease in summarizing large datasets visually, e.g. histograms, contour plots, parallel axis diagrams
  • Math/Stats - confident with descriptive statistics, probability, linear algebra
  • Engineering/Physics conversant - comfortable working with engineering data, e.g. circuit currents/voltages, rotating coordinate systems
  • Technical communication - capable of interpreting a general question into specific analysis, and vice versa
  • Real-world prioritization - adept at ruthlessly prioritizing projects, triaging analysis requests in real-time
  • Eligible to work in the US
Useful Experience
  • Interactive dashboarding tools like Kibana or Tableau
  • SQL or Elasticsearch
  • Amazon Web Services
  • Machine learning
  • Aerospace
  • Spark
  • Git
  • Linux CLI

    SDL2017
